solution_line_template: Kyle has a third of Fabian's number of marbles, so he has {fabian_marbles} / {kyle_divisor} = <<{fabian_marbles}/{kyle_divisor}={kyle_marbles}>>{kyle_marbles} marbles.
Miles has a fifth of Fabian's number of marbles, so he has {fabian_marbles} / {miles_divisor} = <<{fabian_marbles}/{miles_divisor}={miles_marbles}>>{miles_marbles} marbles.
Miles and Kyle together have {kyle_marbles} + {miles_marbles} = <<{kyle_marbles}+{miles_marbles}={total_kyle_miles_marbles}>>{total_kyle_miles_marbles} marbles.
